{{ _('About ICC') }}
{{ _("

The High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China International Curriculum Center (RDFZ ICC) was founded in 2004 with the goal of educating those Chinese students who wish to receive a university education abroad.

") }} {{ _("

There are three programs in the three-year ICC course system: ") }} {{_('General Certificate of Education Advanced Level (AL)')}}, {{_('Advanced Placement Program (AP)')}}, and {{_('International Baccalaureate Diploma Programme (IBDP)')}}.

{{ _("

The campus is located in the Haidian district of Beijing in China.

After a rigorous High School Entrance Exam (Zhongkao) and our own exam, students entering ICC are highly motivated and action orientated.

For the past several years, they have achieved awards in international competitions and exhibitions, including art, dance, debate, drama, math, science, robotics, and sports.

All resources in the main school of RDFZ are shared with the ICC.

") }} {{ _('Learn More') }}arrow_forward
